trends: There has been one other sighting in North Riverside
There were no other sightings in North Riverside on or around July 27th 2012
Summary: Triangular fire ball floating across the sky then far away disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn our backyard and I looked up and thought it was an airplane on fire first. But then it was floating in the sky and flickering. We watched it for a few minutes then it disappeared further away never falling.
